Package ca.cgjennings.graphics

Class AbstractGraphics2DAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Graphics
      • java.awt.Graphics2D
        • ca.cgjennings.graphics.AbstractGraphics2DAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrototypingGraphics2D
    public abstract class AbstractGraphics2DAdapter
extends java.awt.Graphics2D
    A base class for graphics contexts that wrap an existing context to selectively modify their behaviour. Subclasses must override any methods they wish to manipulate, as well as implement the createImpl(java.awt.Graphics2D) method.
    Since:
    3.3
    Author:
    Chris Jennings

      • createImpl

        protected abstract AbstractGraphics2DAdapter createImpl​(java.awt.Graphics2D newG)
        Creates and returns a new instance of this adapter with the same behaviour, but for the specified graphics context.
        Parameters:
        newG - the new graphics context to target
        Returns:
        an adapter that wraps the new context
